iBase_EntitySetHandle *  root_set,
int *  err

Get handle of the root set for this instance.

Get handle of the root set for this instance. All geom in this instance can be accessed from this set.

Parameters:
[in] instance iGeom instance handle
[out] root_set Pointer to set handle returned from function
[out] err Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
void iGeom_load ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
const char *  name,
const char *  options,
int *  err,
int  name_len,
int  options_len 
)

Load a geom from a file.

Load a geom from a file. If entity set is specified, loaded geom is added to that set; specify zero if that is not desired.

Parameters:
[in] instance iGeom instance handle
[in] name File name from which geom is to be loaded
[in] options Pointer to implementation-specific options string
[out] err Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
[in] name_len Length of the file name character string
[in] options_len Length of the options character string
Note:
entity_set_handle Set to which loaded geom will be added, zero if not desired

)

Construct a new iGeom instance.

Construct a new iGeom instance, using implementation-specific options

Parameters:
[in] options Pointer to implementation-specific options string
[out] instance_out Pointer to iGeom instance handle returned from function
[out] err Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
[in] options_len Length of the character string pointed to by options
